    • Method Detail

      • findPtuContainer

        public PtuContainer findPtuContainer(org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                     Integer ptuIndex)
        Finds PtuContainer entity for given period and a given index. This method should only be called in a OPERATE context and not in a loop. If in a loop, use findPtuContainersMap(LocalDate);
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate period.
        ptuIndex - Integer The Ptu Index.
        Returns:
        a PtuContainer.

      • findPtuContainersMap

        public Map<Integer,PtuContainer> findPtuContainersMap(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        Finds PtuContainer entities for given period.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate period.
        Returns:
        a Map linking the PTU Index to its PtuContainer.

      • findPtuContainersForDocumentSequence

        public List<PtuContainer> findPtuContainersForDocumentSequence(Long sequenceNumber,
                                                               Class<? extends Document> documentType)
        Find the PTU Containers for a given sequence number, for a given type of document.
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - Long sequence number
        documentType - Class entity class giving the type of document.
        Returns:
        a List of PtuContainers.

      • updatePtuContainersState

        public int updatePtuContainersState(PtuContainerState state,
                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                    Integer ptuIndex)
        Apply a bulk update to the PtuContainer entities.
        Parameters:
        state - PtuContainerState new state of the PtuContainer.
        period - LocalDate date of the PtuContainer that will be changed.
        ptuIndex - Integer. Optional filter to limit the update to a specific PTU index.
        Returns:
        the number of records updated.

      • updatePtuContainersPhase

        public int updatePtuContainersPhase(PhaseType phase,
                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                    Integer ptuIndex)
        Apply a bulk update to the PtuContainer entities.
        Parameters:
        phase - PhaseType new PhaseType of the PtuContainer.
        period - LocalDate date of the PtuContainer that will be changed.
        ptuIndex - Integer. Optional filter to limit the update to a specific PTU index.
        Returns:
        the number of records updated.

      • findPtuContainers

        public List<PtuContainer> findPtuContainers(org.joda.time.LocalDate ptuDate,
                                            PhaseType... phases)
        Gets the ptuContainers for a certain day and phases.
        Parameters:
        ptuDate - PTU date
        phases - PTU phases
        Returns:
        PTUContainer list

      • initialisePtuContainers

        public int initialisePtuContainers(org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                   Integer ptuIndex)
        Initialises the existing ptuContainers at startup.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate date of the PtuContainer that will be changed.
        ptuIndex - Integer. Optional filter to limit the update to a specific PTU index.
        Returns:
        the number of records updated.

      • findInitializedDaysOfPlanboard

        public List<org.joda.time.LocalDate> findInitializedDaysOfPlanboard()
        Returns the list of dates (present and future, not past) for which the planboard has been initialized (i.e. for which ptu containers exist).
        Returns:
        List of LocalDate.
